src:
Pemprov DKI Minta Kontraktor Kereta Cepat Tanggung Jawab Banjir di Cipinang
04 Nov 2019, 09:33 by Antara
Jakarta - Wali Kota Jakarta Timur, M Anwar, meminta kontraktor Kereta Cepat Jakarta-Bandung untuk bertanggung jawab atas banjir yang melanda RW 12 Cipinang Melayu, Makasar.
"Karena saluran air yang tidak maksimal, saya berharap segera selesaikan pihak pelaksana besok. Saya minta segera mungkin menghadap ke saya merencanakan sebagaimana baiknya," kata Anwar saat meninjau RW12 Cipinang Melayu, Minggu (4/11/2019) kemarin sebagaimana diwartakan Antara.
Anwar mengatakan, saluran air di wilayah itu sengaja disumbat kontraktor, sebab selama ini menghalangi jalur Kereta Api Cepat Jakarta-Bandung, sehingga dilakukan relokasi saluran.
Akibat situasi itu rumah warga di RT07, RT08, RT09, dan RT11 terendam air hujan dengan ketinggian bervariasi antara 20-50 centimeter pada Jumat (1/11) malam. Anwar menuding pengembang tidak serius melakukan pengerjaan proyek lintasan transportasi kereta di wilayah setempat.
text:
DKI Provincial Government Asks Fast Train Contractors to Flood Responsibility in Cipinang
Nov 04 2019, 09:33 by Antara
Jakarta - The Mayor of East Jakarta, M Anwar, asked the Jakarta-Bandung Fast Train contractor to be responsible for the floods that hit RW 12 Cipinang Melayu, Makassar.
"Because the water channel is not optimal, I hope to immediately resolve the implementation tomorrow. I ask as soon as possible to face me plan as well," Anwar said while reviewing RW12 Cipinang Melayu, Sunday (4/11/2019) yesterday as reported by Antara.
Anwar said that the waterways in the area were deliberately blocked by the contractor, because all this time it was blocking the Jakarta-Bandung Fast Train line, so that the channel was relocated.
As a result of this situation residents' houses in RT07, RT08, RT09 and RT11 were submerged by rainwater with heights varying between 20-50 centimeters on Friday (1/11) night. Anwar accused the developer of not being serious in carrying out the railway transportation project in the local area.
